title: Kiss -The Mental Zone Charlotte NC 1985 ak320
description:
Kiss - The Mental Zone Charlotte NC 1985 ak320

An awesome soundboard recording of the 20th show of the "Asylum" tour in support of KISS's thirteenth studio album, featuring the debut of lead guitarist Bruce Kulick. The new lineup of Paul Stanley, Gene Simmons, Eric Carr, and Bruce Kulick would last for six years until Carr's death in November 1991.
The tour for the album featured the largest Kiss logo on stage the band has ever used, as well as one of the largest lighting rigs, and was the first Kiss tour since the Dynasty Tour to stay inside North America. 

Tracklist

01. Intro / Detroit Rock City
02. Fits Like A Glove
03. Uh! All Night
04. Cold Gin
05. Under The Gun
06. Bruce's solo
07. I Still Love You
08. Gene's solo
09. I Love It Loud
10. Tears Are Falling
11. Eric's solo
12. War Machine
13. Love Gun
14. Rock And Roll All Nite
15. Heaven's On Fire
16. Lick It Up*

Bonus Tracks

17 Firehouse(Bonus).mp3
18 Hotter Than Hell(Bonus).mp3
19 Black Diamond(Bonus).mp3
20 God Of Thunder(Bonus).mp3


KISS - "Welcome To The Metal Zone"
Charlotte Coliseum, Charlotte, North Carolina
December 28th, 1985

Players

Gene Simmons - vocals & bass guitar
Paul Stanley - vocals & guitar
Eric Carr - drums & vocals
Bruce Kulick - lead guitar
